sen.j: 福井興七郎（ふくいこうひちろう、生没年不詳）は安土桃山時代の人物で因幡国気多郡 (鳥取県)勝部奥郷八葉寺（はっしょうじ）村在住の地侍。
sen.e: Kohichiro FUKUI (year of birth and death unknown), who lived in the Azuchi Momoyama period, was a jizamurai (local samurai), whose base was in the village of Katsube Okugo Hasshoji, Keta County, Inaba Province (Tottori Prefecture).

Kohichiro FUKUI (year of birth and death unknown), who lived in the Azuchi Momoyama period, was a jizamurai (local samurai), whose base was in the village of Katsube Okugo Hasshoji, Keta County, Inaba Province (Tottori Prefecture).

Kohichiro FUKUI (year of birth and death unknown), who lived in the Azuchi Momoyama period, was a jizamurai (local samurai), whose base was in the village of Katsube Okugo Hasshoji, Keta County, Inaba Province (Tottori Prefecture).
sen.cmt: 原文の「気多郡」がだぶっており、一つ削除しました。

sen.j: 天正8年（1580年）8月中旬、同村の長田肥前と落人を討ち取り吉川氏へ差し出して恩賞を得ようと共謀した。
sen.e: In the mid-August 1580, together with Hizen NAGATA from the same village, he schemed to capture samurai on the run and hand over them to the Kikkawa clan for a reward.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処

sen.e: In mid-September 1580, together with Hizen NAGATA from the same village, he schemed to capture samurai on the run and hand them over to the Kikkawa clan for a reward.

sen.j: 一族の者30余人を率いて付近の山を捜索した。
sen.e: He led about 30 kinsmen and hunted for runaways in the surrounding mountains.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処

sen.j: 丁度、その頃長和田の十三日崩れで敗れ但馬国へ逃げ延びる途中であった山名氏豊らを発見、これを殺害した。
sen.e: He tracked down Ujitoyo YAMANA and others, who were fleeing to Tajima Province upon defeat in the thirteen days' collapse in Nagota, and assassinated them.
He tracked down Ujitoyo YAMANA and others, who were fleeing to Tajima Province upon defeat in the collapse of Nagota in thirteen days, and assassinated them.

sen.j: その時、興七郎は氏豊の従者・四宮源蔵に切り倒されたというがその生死は不明である。
sen.e: It is said that on that occasion, Kohichiro was stubbed to death by Genzo SHINOMIYA, Ujitoyo's aide, but whether he was dead or alive is unclear.
